name: Grapple bot
description:
This is my 2DPlatformer project with the following elements :

  1. An unlit level full of alternative paths and shortcuts
  2. A colored indicator showing you the way to a nearby key, you will need them !
  3. Let Grapple Bot accompany you on your journey !
    1. With a left click, he can grapple nearby walls and let you swing on them
    2. With a right one, he can put you near the point of the grapple
    3. He will light your way in this dark environment
  4. Platforms can and should be grappled to get to the exit
  5. Grey walls cannot be grappled, time to get creative !
  6. Key objectives are lit up, follow the path, you'll be fine !

Credits :

Created by Raphael Thiebault
